str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
From hiko; competent, i.e. Ample or fit.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: To do, perform, accomplish; be in any condition, i.e. I fare; I exact, require.
From peri and ergon; working all around, i.e. Officious.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From sun and phero; to bear together, i.e. to collect, or to conduce; especially advantage.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Properly, the inner bark of the papyrus plant, i.e. a sheet or scroll of writing.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To burn up, consume entirely. From kata and kaio; to burn down, i.e. Consume wholly.
Neuter of a compound of en and a derivative of optanomai; in the face of.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A price, honor. From tino; a value, i.e. Money paid, or valuables; by analogy, esteem, or the dignity itself.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To compute, reckon up, count together. From sun and psephizo; to compute jointly.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of arguros; silvery, i.e. cash; specially, a silverling.
